name: Jeff and his 10 seconds
description:
Jeff's every 10 seconds is a mini comedy game. It's made for LD51. lol

Jeff, who will spend 10 seconds on every daily jobs, finds that there is something stop him from finishing his jobs in time. So he decides to figure out what happens to him.

This game is exploring how far the minilism style gameplay can go on storytelling. Gameplay variation and different level designs are used to demonstrate different sections of the story. Some gameplays are pretty much inspired by the narrative itself. And the gameplay also influence the story. The last part of the story is changed because of the crazy 'chasing the bad ball' level. Now, the ending becomes really fun and kind of ironic. 

Controls: Point and Click(Mobile Supported!)
